extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for MLB 2012: The Show on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.. All 35 Trophies included. Descriptions for all 35 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when the selected is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Sony Computer Entertainment.

reviews.comment: The check list is neat. Provides a pocket version of what you see on your PS3.
reviews.author: A Google User
